title: How does the cloud technology work? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cloud technology offers a range of services with reliability, security, and scalability and they come at a fraction of the cost of owning them yourself. But here’s how it all works. These services include processing power, storage, networking, AI and intelligence, and much more. The main benefits of cloud services are that you don’t need to have the expertise yourself and can obtain them at a fraction of the cost of hosting them yourself. Other benefits of cloud technology include: Performance and reliability - as vendors are continuously improving their platforms while focusing on security.Managed services - so you don’t really have to worry about any of the technicalities.Scalability - allows you to obtain services that match your needs both in terms of functionality and cost and also scale up and down as required.Low-latency - geographical decentralization so that you can provide a low-latency service to your users no matter where they are situated.Cloud services are available in many flavors. The most popular out of these are the public cloud which is operated by a multitude of vendors like Amazon, IBM, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure. In addition, organizations have their own cloud servers that are used for their own businesses. These are called the private cloud. There is also an intermediate solution called the Hybrid cloud that offers the best of both public and private cloud through data and application sharing. This type of solution is utilized when organizations wish to leverage the expertise and functionality of public cloud vendors while having their own servers. Another important aspect of cloud computing is cloud desktops. In addition to cloud servers, personal computing has also seen many improvements through the cloud and increased in popularity due to the flexibility and security it offers.
